abstract: Python3 scripts for feeding the European HFR Node (EU HFR Node) database for the HFR Online Outage Reporting Tool (HOORT).
description: Python3 scripts for feeding the European HFR Node (EU HFR Node) database for the HFR Online Outage Reporting Tool (HOORT). Tools to be run at the EU HFR Node. The applications are designed for High Frequency Radar (HFR) data management according to the European HFR node processing workflow, thus feeding the database with information about last available data and radial delay from each HFR system connected to the Node.
